clustering_numpy.distance¶

clustering_numpy.distance(centres: ndarray, points: ndarray) → ndarray¶

This function calculates the euclidean distance between each point from centres and each point from dataset and stores those distances in an array by using matrix product, which can reduce the usage of for loops and will not change the kmean algorithm itself.

Parameters¶

centres: np.ndarray

A set of points which contains all centres

points: np.ndarray

Dataset loaded from the csv file contains all points

Returns¶

mat_distnp.ndarray

A matrix contains the euclidean distance D_ij which means it is the distance between point i in points and point j in centres.

aigeanpy
